definition: peptide bond CO-NH/bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

sentences.english: Describe peptide bond formation and its structure in great detail.
sentences.chinese: 請詳細描述肽鍵的形成與其結構。

sentences.english: Can you deduce other structure formations based on the peptide bond structure?
sentences.chinese: 你可以基於肽鍵結構推導出其它結構嗎？

sentences.english: Serine proteases catalyze the cleavge of peptide bonds in proteins.
sentences.chinese: 絲氨酸蛋白酶催化蛋白質中肽鍵的分解。
